channel.title: My Ode' to MoparSacpe (My version of Caseys thread, but a hole new song)!
channel.description:
For all of you that think I created this song from scratch, I DIDN'T. I pretty much replaced words like "Pokemon" with "MoparScape" add added in words like Commands... So you're not paying out on my, you're paying out on people the created the theme song for one of the biggest TV shows for kids. Good going.
Based: Pokemon Theme (couldn't think of a more lamer song for the... ode?)
Edit by: Jackson (ME Big Grin)
MoparScape! Dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun DUN DUN DUN
I wanna be, the very best... The best coder ever knowwwnnnnn. DUN DUN DUN DUN
Adding commands, is my real test Making a cutooooommm "Kill Allll"
I will search, through client.java Searching for public voids! Each method, to understand The difficulty inside!
MoparScape! - It's you me, I know it's my destiny! (MoparScape) Ooh I know you're my only friend In a server we must defend!
MoparScape - Ooh, a dream so true With difficulty I will face I will code every day Leeching methods and commands!
Every error, along the way, From my compilerrrrrrrr I will fail, every attempt, To fix up my customssssss (MoparScape!)
Code with me, the time is right There's no smaller client.java Pixel in Pixel, we'll make server, It's always been our dream!
MoparScape! - it's you and me I know it's my destiny (MoparScape!) Oh - you're my only friend In a server we must defend!
MoparScape! - a server so true Our client will pull us through You teach me and I'll teach you MoparScape - Gotta code 'Em All!
Gotta post some more! - yeah
MoparScape - it's you and me A server, my destiny (MoparScape) Oh - you're my only friend In a server we must defend!
MoparScape - a server so true Our coding will pull us through You teach me and I'll teach you MoparScape - Gotta post some more!
DUN DUN DUN!
MOPAR-SCAPE! -------------------------- :D

item.title: My Ode' to MoparSacpe (My version of Caseys thread, but a hole new song)!
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

For all of you that think I created this song from scratch, I DIDN’T. I pretty much replaced words like “Pokemon” with “MoparScape” add added in words like Commands… So you’re not paying out on my, you’re paying out on people the created the theme song for one of the biggest TV shows for kids.
Good going.

Based: Pokemon Theme (couldn’t think of a more lamer song for the… ode?)

Edit by: Jackson (ME Big Grin)

MoparScape!
Dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun dun
DUN DUN DUN

I wanna be, the very best…
The best coder ever knowwwnnnnn.
DUN DUN DUN DUN

Adding commands, is my real test
Making a cutooooommm “Kill Allll”

I will search, through client.java
Searching for public voids!
Each method, to understand
The difficulty inside!

MoparScape! - It’s you me,
I know it’s my destiny! (MoparScape)
Ooh I know you’re my only friend
In a server we must defend!

MoparScape - Ooh, a dream so true
With difficulty I will face
I will code every day
Leeching methods and commands!

Every error, along the way,
From my compilerrrrrrrr
I will fail, every attempt,
To fix up my customssssss (MoparScape!)

Code with me, the time is right
There’s no smaller client.java
Pixel in Pixel, we’ll make server,
It’s always been our dream!

MoparScape! - it’s you and me
I know it’s my destiny (MoparScape!)
Oh - you’re my only friend
In a server we must defend!

MoparScape! - a server so true
Our client will pull us through
You teach me and I’ll teach you
MoparScape - Gotta code 'Em All!

Gotta post some more! - yeah

MoparScape - it’s you and me
A server, my destiny (MoparScape)
Oh - you’re my only friend
In a server we must defend!

MoparScape - a server so true
Our coding will pull us through
You teach me and I’ll teach you
MoparScape - Gotta post some more!

DUN DUN DUN!

MOPAR-SCAPE!

Read full topic
